properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM CLASS_POST WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NO , P.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_NAME , P.USER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , P.POST_TITLE , P.CREATE_DATE , COUNT(C.POST_NO) AS "COMMENT_COUNT" , COUNT(A.FILE_NO) AS "FILE_COUNT" FROM CLASS_POST P JOIN CLASS_BOARD B ON P.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN USERS U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_COMMENT C ON C.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_ATTACHMENT A ON A.POST_NO = P.POST_NO WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY P.POST_NO , P.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_NAME , P.USER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , P.POST_TITLE , P.CREATE_DATE ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ?
